mapper.select: SELECT share_id,description,file_name,file_type,file_size,share_state,share_time, i.img_path, i.img_name, u.user_id,u.user_name FROM tb_share_file left join tb_user u on u.user_id = share_user_id left join tb_user_img i on i.img_id = share_file_id order by share_time desc;

SELECT share_id,description,file_name,file_type,file_size,share_state,share_time, i.img_path, i.img_name, u.user_id,u.user_name FROM tb_share_file left join tb_user u on u.user_id = share_user_id left join tb_user_img i on i.img_id = share_file_id where share_file_id = #{file_id} order by share_time desc;
